attributes.action: Prevent Steve Bannon from travelling to the UK & ban his media network
attributes.additional_details:
Steve Bannon enjoys support at home in America from the neo-nazis, white nationalists and white supremacists. More recently he has travelled to Europe and met with racist, facist political parties such as Marie Le Pens Front National party a well know racist, anti-Islam political party in France where in a statement he said that they should ''accept accusations of racism with pride''.
Steve Bannon wants to change Europe from a tolerant, multi-cultural society to one of racism, hate and fear.
attributes.background: Steve Bannon who is the former chief strategist for president Donald Trump and ex-head of the alt right network Breitbart news has recently announced that he is ''planning foundation'' to to boost the far right in Europe.
